title: Schmackofatz
description: A vegan restaurant opened for dinner only, serving from 6-10pm. Offers varied vegan seasonal international cuisine. Sweets include round cakes, pies and more. Coffee drinks include cappuccino, espresso, caffe, caffe latte (with syrup). In the winter, offers under-floor heating to provide a warm place to relax. In the summer has a beer garden, under umbrellas, overlooking the small bamboo grove. Child-friendly. Dogs are always welcome and greeted with filled water bowls.
